original_title: 催眠洗脳された媚肉雌は嫌がりながらも淫乱ビッチになっていた
overview: The fourth work in the series. Neighbor Yu Shinoda, Kyo's reason reaches the limit due to the female odor drifting from AIKA. Kyo gives women a powerful brainwash. Even in front of their boyfriend and husband, they starve for Kyo's meat stick and devour it like crazy. When it was inserted into the vagina, the brainwashing was released and it was pulled back to reality, and when the penis was pulled out from the vagina, it became brainwashed again.
title: The Bitch That Was Hypnotized And Brainwashed Became A Dirty Slut. AIKA Yu Shinoda
